links.uploadCvDescription: Import your experience from an existing resume
links.experiencesDescription: View and manage your work history
links.starStoriesDescription: Build achievement stories with AI assistance

list.title: Stories
list.empty: No stories yet for this experience.
list.emptyDescription: Create your first STAR story to document your achievements.
list.autoGenerateDescription: Let AI extract multiple STAR stories from your experience data

global.title: All STAR Stories
global.description: Browse all your achievement stories across all experiences
global.emptyDescription: Create STAR stories from your experiences to document your achievements.

delete.title: Delete Story
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this story? This action cannot be undone.

builder.newDescription: Build a STAR story to document your achievement
builder.chooseMode: Choose how to create your story
builder.chooseModeDescription: Select the method that works best for you
builder.modeExperienceDescription: AI will extract stories from your experience data
builder.modeFreetextDescription: Provide your own text and AI will structure it
builder.modeInterviewDescription: Provide your own text and AI will structure it
builder.modeManualDescription: Fill in the STAR fields yourself
builder.freetextInstructions: Describe your achievement or situation in your own words. The AI will analyze your text and structure it into a STAR story format.
builder.freetextPlaceholder: Example: I led a project to migrate our monolithic application to microservices. The system was experiencing performance issues and our deployment process took hours. I designed a new architecture, trained the team on containerization, and implemented CI/CD pipelines. As a result, we reduced deployment time by 85% and improved system reliability to 99.9% uptime.
builder.freeTextPlaceholder: Paste or type your achievement description here, and we'll help structure it into a STAR story...
builder.situationHint: Describe the context or challenge you faced
builder.situationPlaceholder: What was the situation or challenge?
builder.taskHint: What was your specific responsibility or goal?
builder.taskPlaceholder: What were you asked to do?
builder.actionHint: What specific actions did you take?
builder.actionPlaceholder: What did you do to address the situation?
builder.resultHint: What was the outcome or impact?
builder.resultPlaceholder: What was the result of your actions?
builder.achievementsHint: Press Enter to add each achievement
builder.kpisHint: Press Enter to add each KPI
builder.notFoundDescription: The story you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.

interview.welcome: Let's build your STAR story! I'll guide you through four steps to capture your achievement.
interview.contextProvided: I see you have some experience context. Let's use that to build your story.
interview.storyGenerated: Great! I've generated your STAR story from your answers. You can now review and edit it.

situation.question: First, tell me about the situation. What was the context or challenge you faced?

task.question: What was your specific task or responsibility in this situation?

action.question: What actions did you take to address this situation?

result.question: Finally, what were the results or outcomes of your actions?

errors.emptyAnswer: Please provide an answer before continuing
errors.incompleteInterview: Please complete all steps before generating the story
errors.generationFailed: Failed to generate story. Please try again.

situation.label: Situation
situation.description: Describe the context or challenge you faced
situation.placeholder: What was the situation or problem?

task.label: Task
task.description: What was your specific responsibility or goal?
task.placeholder: What were you asked or expected to do?

action.label: Action
action.description: What specific actions did you take?
action.placeholder: What steps did you take to address the situation?

result.label: Result
result.description: What was the outcome or impact?
result.placeholder: What was the result of your actions? Include metrics if possible.

enhancer.noKpis: No KPIs yet. Click regenerate to generate suggestions.

canvas.title: Personal Business Model Canvas
canvas.description: Your strategic career positioning and value proposition

empty.title: No Canvas Yet
empty.description: Generate your canvas from your profile and experiences to visualize your career strategy.

page.title: Personal Canvas
page.description: Your strategic career positioning visualized as a Business Model Canvas

placeholders.customerSegments: Who are your target companies/roles? What industries or organizations do you want to serve?
placeholders.valueProposition: What unique value do you offer? What makes you different from other candidates?
placeholders.channels: How do you reach employers? (LinkedIn, job boards, networking events, referrals, etc.)
placeholders.customerRelationships: How do you build relationships with employers? (Networking, personal branding, follow-ups, etc.)
placeholders.keyActivities: What are your core professional activities? What do you do best?
placeholders.keyResources: What skills, knowledge, network, certifications, and tools do you have?
placeholders.keyPartners: Who helps you in your career? (Mentors, recruiters, professional associations, coaches, etc.)
placeholders.costStructure: What investments do you make? (Courses, certifications, conferences, tools, subscriptions, etc.)
placeholders.revenueStreams: What compensation/benefits do you seek? (Salary, bonuses, equity, benefits, growth opportunities, etc.)
